doc:
Christian Camargo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_Camargo 0 Christian Camargo (né Minnick; born July 7, 1971) is an American actor, producer, writer, and director. He is perhaps best known for his roles as Brian Moser in the Showtime drama Dexter, Michael Corrigan in the Netflix drama House of Cards, Petty Officer Pavel Loktev in K-19: The Widowmaker and Eleazar in The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn – Parts 1 and 2. Christian_Camargo ( né_Minnick ; born July_7_,_1971 ) is an_American_actor , producer , writer , and director . He is_perhaps_best_known for his_roles as Brian_Moser in the_Showtime_drama_Dexter , Michael_Corrigan in the_Netflix_drama_House of Cards , Petty_Officer_Pavel_Loktev in K-19 : The_Widowmaker_and_Eleazar in The_Twilight_Saga : Breaking Dawn – Parts 1_and_2 .
